00027 struct CSFHeader
00028 {
00029         DWORD Signature; //should be CSF_SIGNATURE
00030         int CSFVersion; //RA2 uses 3
00031         int NumLabels;
00032         int NumValues;
00033         DWORD unused_0xC;
00034         int Language; //CSF_LANG_*, forced to US if CSFVersion < 2
00035 };
00036 
00037 struct CSFLabel
00038 {
00039         char Name[0x20]; //limits the label name length to 31
00040         int NumValues; //one label can have multiple values attached, that's never used though
00041         int FirstValueIndex; //in the global StringTable::Values() array
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct CSFString
00045 {
00046         CSFString *PreviousEntry;
00047         wchar_t Text[102];
00048 
00049         CSFString() : PreviousEntry(NULL) {
00050                 *Text = 0;
00051         }
00052 };
